title: Provide lists of tests to be carried out at each stage of work and allow the further work only after satisfying with the same
clause_text: Provide lists of tests to be carried out at each stage of work and allow the further work only after satisfying with the same. To verify the structural elements in compliance with structural drawings.
section: C-4.3 Duties and Responsibilities of Structural Engineer

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Provide lists of tests to be carried out at each stage of work and allow the further work only after satisfying with the same.
